pageContext.claim: “And also, it will destroy at least five million jobs.”
pageContext.analysis: These numbers comes from a campaign document that has been laundered through the Wall Street Journal editorial page in order to lend some authority to the numbers. The claim that Biden's plan would destroy 5 trillion jobs is fiction. The number comes from a report co-written by President Trump’s former chief economic adviser, so it’s clearly designed for campaign weaponization. The number is an estimate for 2030, a decade in the future — not even during a theoretical two-term Biden presidency -- and is disputed by other, more reputable analyses.
